issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Add support for reading partitioned Parquet files
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11019](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11019). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add support for reading Parquet files that are partitioned by key where the files are under a directory structure based on partition keys and values.

/path/to/files/KEY1=value/KEY2=value/files

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11019?focusedCommentId=17332327) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Migrated to github: https://github.com/apache/arrow-datafusion/issues/133
